content.detailedDescription:
In the evening of november 16, 2013, around a quarter to seven, it was dark in lockhart, texas.   i was walking the cat behind our apartment complex which runs north and south.  my attention was drawn to a bright orange light moving behind the trees.   for an instant, i thought it was a bolide, but then discarded that idea because it was moving so slowly and left no trail.   it was about 500 feet above the ground, and the sky was hazy with a visibility of maybe 5 miles.  the hazy full moon was visible but stars were not.   there is a small airport a mile to the south, so i thought the light might be coming from a small aircraft moving at 100 mph, but there was no noise.   it took about 15 seconds for the light to go from being due west of me to disappearing behind the trees to the north.
	i then saw a second light, the same color, brightness, altitude, speed, and track.   i walked back to my apartment, and a third light appeared, following the first two.   i then saw a commercial jet aircraft flying west from the austin-bergstrom airport 15 miles to the northeast.   its sound was following behind it by 4 seconds, so it was 4000 feet away.  my lights were much closer, still completely silent.   i tried to take a cellphone video of the 3rd light but it didn't register.   i got my wife out to look as the fourth light went by.   it did not register on the cell phone either but she verified my sighting.
	the lights were the color of the sodium-vapor street light across the street.  they presented as a sphere about 1/20th the size of the full moon's disk.  their illumination was uniform from center to edge.  there seemed to be no obstruction such as a landing light lamp holder which would change the shape or intensity of the light as the viewing angle changed.   there was an almost imperceptable pulsing of the light; maybe 1% of the total brightness, at about 1 second intervals, but it was not a separate light such as a xenon-discharge marker.   i could see the individual lights on the commercial jet, in focus thru the haze, but these orange lights were not coming from a point source.   they looked like an out-of-focus source, something like looking at venus thru a telescope that is not in focus, but one or two magnitudes brighter than venus.
	observer:   chris franks    hobbies include astronomy and identifying lights in the sky.   this is my first failure-to-identify in 80 years.   worked as an electrical engineer for the aircraft radio division of cessna aircraft, then 41-1/2 years as an engineer for hewlett packard.   worked with charles adams, who analyzed the "crystal skull" artifact and debunked its supposed extra-terrestial origin.
content.summary: Four bright soundless orange lights travelling north after each other

content.detailedDescription: I had just waken up when i had first seen something in the sky it looked like a black and white sphere (i took a photo at this time)  and then it descended towards me extremely quickly and hovered about at necks hight for a min or 2, it was about 4 feet in diameter it began to float to the ground while humming. after it had landed a odd symbol appeared i tryied to take a pic of it at this time but my phone was not working correctly. it made another sound that sounded like talking i couldn't understand it then, then i touched the symbol it was colder than ice  the last thing i remember is being pushed by something and then being extremely tired and then i woke up 2 hours later and i cant seem to get these thought out of my mind,there are only 4 there were these small pebbles that were to be inserted into living animals, there were little obsidian ball that exploded and there was seemed like a spherical television that held organs,  and the chatter i heard before i can say for certan what exactly it said but i i know it d something to do with human population. during the entire experience i was relatively calm it almost felt like i knew what it was, like an old friend i first belived it to be a childs balloon he had discarded. sombody please see this i think this may be something that needs to be looked into.
content.summary: First i saw it in the sky then irt came to me i touched it it pushed me back i fell and 2 hours later i wake up with numbers and a strag

content.detailedDescription: At around 430 on 18 october 2013 i was pulling on to county road 1718 headed north when i noticed a curved light that at first i thought was the moon.  it was to the north east.  i looked too the north west and discovered that the light was not the moon because a near full mine was there in the sky.  the object appeared to be moving to the south west i pulled off of the road as the object passed over my car.  it appeared to be about 500 feet above me under some low clouds.  it was about 60 to 70 feet in length and some what triangle in shape but because it was dark in color a i am not 100% sure.  it hah a lot of lights in rows making a square block of lights with a smaller group of lights to the front in a block like shape.  the object was silent and moved slowly for an aircraft.  the weather was partly cloudy with some patchy ground fog.  i estimate the clouds to be less than 700 feet above the surface and the winds were calm.  the whole event took place in about 5 to 6 minutes or less.  i have never witnessed anything like this before.
content.summary: Spotted light to north east  of my location which was 2 miles north of holly pond on co rd 1718

content.detailedDescription: I was just sitting watching tv lastnight when noticed white lights in sky moving about very very fast i observed this for about 20mins or so then it went that was about 17.16hrs about 19.35hrs it returned i got my camera and managed to capture a photo of it ,the strange thing is what i was watching is not what i got on camera,what i got is actually quite frightening ive never seen anything like this in my life
content.summary: 2 large orbs over house chaising each other managed to get photo of event ive never seen anything like it before

content.detailedDescription: I was on a delta flight from tucson to atlanta. we were descending and making our turn to the ne. about 5000 ft. i was in front of wing, window seat. right side of aircraft. we started our turn and wing began to rise. i was looking out window almost north at the chattanooga valley. i leaned into the window to continue to look out window. i saw a sphere solid mass. looked like aluminum no seams.  reflective surface. about the size of a vw bug. about 500 feet below aircraft. came from southwest under plane and went to northeast. beyond wing. it flew in a straight line. we were reducing speed and the sphere appeared to be at a constant speed.  i lost site of it after about 30 seconds. i tried to get my wife to move over to see but it was to late. i was excited. i have flown hundreds of times through this area and never seen anything like this. i am a civil engineer and have worked outside and around the country. i am still not sure i saw a alien  craft. it was a ufo to me.  i am also the son of an air force pilot. a was born on an air base and grew up 18 year at  or near an air force base. i saw a picture of a ufo in washington state in 2003 it looked exactly like what i saw. hope i see another.
content.summary: Flying into to atlanta made turn  from sw sphere few under aircraft  from west to east big as vs bug.

content.detailedDescription:
While traveling on the ohio turnpike, eastbound, on sunday, nov. 10, 2013, 6:40 p.M., approximately 10 miles from the exit for interstate 80, i saw a small, red orb directly in front of my car, flying at an altitude of approximately 200 ft., traverse the night sky from the northern horizon to the southern horizon in a matter of 2 ��� 3 seconds. my field of vision was entirely free of any obstructions or conditions which could reduce clarity. also, the topography where the sighting took place is quite flat, providing clear vision of the sky from horizon to horizon.
 
as a former military pilot who has flown and observed, on many occasions, supersonic jet aircraft, equipped with afterburners, the speed of this orb, literally, took my breath away.  it was such an extraordinary speed that, despite my flying experience, i found it somewhat frightening.  i cannot gauge its actual speed but it far exceeded anything i have ever seen in the sky and was totally silent.  i am quite sure, also, that it was not of earthly origins.  i keep up with aircraft developments and can state that there is nothing in development, to my knowledge, that can travel, anywhere near, the speed, in total silence, as did this orb.
this was my second orb sighting ��� the first being in august of this year in ocean city md, involving a series of 8 very large orange orbs appearing at 10 minute intervals over the atlantic ocean, all executing the same, precise, flight pattern.

as a field investigator for mufon, i filed a report on the website for this md sighting.  thereafter, i began a comprehensive study of the orb phenomenon, looking and mapping, in particular, flight patterns within the u.S.  in regard to this recent ohio sighting, the orb was coming from the direction of lake erie, at a location which would put its point of origin at lake erie where, according to the flight patterns in that area, i have concluded, there is likely an underwater base from which these orbs emanate.  also, to bolster this conclusion, there was a fairly recent sighting on lake erie, from presque isle, where the witness observed an orange orb hover over a location on the lake, not far from the shoreline, then descend into the water.
content.summary: Observed small red orb traverse the sky from the north horizon to the south horizon in a matter of a few seconds.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i seen something very very strange on oct 23, 2010. i was in the house watching tv and my husband came in screaming come out here right away...For some reason i thought he said "fire" so i ran around the house looking for smoke or fire. found nothing, so i thought where is he...I ran out the front door of our home which faces the north. i stopped right away and stood there for a second then walked to the sidewalk next to him and my mouth dropped open...I started to shake and told him i think this is the real thing (ufo sighting) very close it appears. i would say it lasted approx 10 to 15mins.  at first my husband thought they were space rocks. two objects what appeared to be fire balls came out of the sky falling towards earth and then criss-crossed each other then stop in mid-air right next to each other.  they then appeared to open up like a globe, and i seen red/white lights, but my husband seen blue/white blinking inside these globes ?? then the one on the left blinked 2x and the one on the right did the same this went on 1 more time each...As if they were talking to each other - then the one on the right moved sideways towards the east. my knees felt weak and my breathing > hard to breath. my husband ran in the house to get his camera, but the objects starting falling behind the tree line out of sight before he returned. the lights then seem to turn blue to me at that point. in all my born days i've never seen a craft of ours do this...We will never ever believe what we seen were flares it was nothing i've ever seen in my life. i was very shook up, and had to go lay down...Watched the 9pm news it was mentioned 1x ( i printed that news article off the internet ) for proof. they tried to tell the public it was testing...But was not mention on the 10pm news that i could find. from then on i have seen approx 4 more sightings of white bright lights moving across the arizona skies. they are very high almost what appears as high as stars. they are moving with direction mainly to the north or moving east. my husband and i  seen our last sighting on oct 31, 2013 @ 6:30pm a white light moving in the south towards south mountains. i've lived here all my life born and raised. i'm telling you something is up there and not all are our military testing. why would they test right over the city?? no way...This is real.  i hope more people from phoenix come forward these sightings are increasing. we think we might be  living on a highway of some sort and this is why az see's so much. i swear my statement is true.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Fire balls falling from the phoenix sky then stop open into globe shapes with lights inside blinking then object moves sideways

content.detailedDescription: I went out on my balcony and at first i thought i saw an airplane, i live close to detroit metro airport, so lights are often above, but then another came behind it, and another, and another, they were fast and bright as s**t, they had red and blue lights on the ends and white lights too, there was one all blue and it was the fastest,i have never seen anything so fast and bright. they were so close to each other, they could not have been airplanes. some of my neighbors who were outside saw them also, we could not beleive what we saw! then they all flew off to the north
content.summary: At least 20 objects flying behind each other, very bright and very fast

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking with my friend walking her dog smoking a cigarette in the freezinggg cold. standing in a field where the entire sky is visible. not a cloud or ounce of overcast in sight. light pollution is at a minimum there, as well. at first i heard the humming noise and searched around for what i thought would be a plane. it was not far behind me, coming from the south east. as i started to say, "hey, friend check out that pl-", she said "uhhh, wtf isss thatt?" even the dog was interested in it more a few seconds, but he has a short attention span, and was way more interested in things he could actually get a hold of here on earth.

it didn't fly directly above our heads, and perception of distance without a ruler is difficult for me. however, i'd say it was about three hundred yards to the left, and probably the same in the air. it's shape was an upside down pyramid, with orange blinking lights on each corner that flashed sporadically. the tip of the pyramid, which was facing the ground, was illuminated with orange lights all around about halfway up. the space between those lights and the lights on the three base corners was completely dark, no reflections, just an absence of stars in that space. 

it traveled at a steady slow speed in the direction of nw. i kept my eyes on it for what felt like forever, probably 2 minutes, as it just got smaller into the distance. it never ascended or descended just sort of vanished. i imagine it shut off the orange lights as it came upon more populated areas, like washington twsp. 

i am a healthy young woman. i have beyond perfect distance vision and was under the influence of nothing, same for my friend. we tried to tell our boyfriends when we got inside, but they were so caught up in gta5, and think we're both crazy already. our effort of making them listen and take us seriously seemed futile, so i am reaching out to this community.
content.summary: Upside down pyramid, orange lights, low hum, slow speed.

content.detailedDescription: coordinates ,37.266, -79.905,focal length 4.6mm,exposure 1/3759,f number f/2.8,iso 200.Walking the greenway. saw orb out of the corner of my right eye.Thought it was a bird at first. orb was moving towards me in a straight line about 50 feet away, then saw it and grabbed my phone out of my pocket and started taking photos as fast as i could and got 3 pics before the orb took off very fast straight up and disappeared. my feelings were good because i busted an orb checking me out.Lost sight when it shot up in the sky.
content.summary: Saw orb out of corner of eye.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my living room playing a video game, and while i was waiting for the loading screen to finish a small red flash caught my attention out the corner of my eye. with it being dark at an earlier hour(normally around 9pm during (spring)summer and 6pm during (fall)winter), i have gotten use to refelctions in the windows at night and the only light that does reflect in the window is a green light from our smoke detector, to rule out mistaking it as a reflection i walked to the door four feet away from the window,clear from all reflections.

i see a set of lights that did not behave anything like navigation lights on airplanes or helicopters. the object was cigar/disc shaped with a solid white light across the top and bottom of it's shape and at the ends of the object where two red lights blinked one after another, as one red light blinked on the other blinked off. my window faces east, the object hovered in place for a few seconds then the object moved a very short distance to the north and then, best way to describe it, it just disappeared. this was around 6:55-7:00pm i made note of the time to see how long it would be if it would appear again

later the same night, around 9:30-9:40pm i was setting up our coffee for the next morning when out the kitchen window when another red light caught my eye, it was nearly identical to what i saw earlier, except the white light across the top of the object was red and the light across the bottom was white. the red lights on either side flashed in the same manner as the fisrt time, the object barely move but stayed still for about 15 seconds before disappearing like before. i know this was not an airplane or a helicopter cause man made aircraft cannot just appear and disappear, this was a clear night and the object was well above the tree tops.

i live within 100 miles of fort knox army base, so there is some air traffic in my area, i know what c1-30's look like at night, this object was at least twice the size of a c1-30 based on the distance of red light to red light on the object.
content.summary: A cigar/disc like shape w/blinking red lights and solid white lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was fishing on a lake at about 9;30 at night with my freind pat and his brother jim when all of a sudden apeared a huge glowing blimp shaped object, it imitted a green and yellowish light. me and my freinds knew instantly it was a u.F.O. we watched as it moved towards a moutain at a slow pace. when it reached the mountain it went behind it came out the other end,went back in and dissapeered. it was there for about 20 minutes and then without a noise it was gone. about 30 years later i had taken my son to fish at the same lake at the same location and i told him the story about the ufo and right as i said that my freind pat had been there with me a truck pulled up behind us. the driver stepped out. it was pat!!!! who had not seen me for 30 years. he told my son that i wasnt lying and that he was there with me. i thought that it was a little weird that he had chossen to go to the same place we saw the ufo on the same day as me after we hadnt seen each other in 30 years. when me and my son left my son kept saying to me that if my story was true then pat must of been an alien sent to spy on us. i just laughed and we went back to the place where we were going to stay that night. im still not sure if pat was an alien but my son continues to insist on it.
content.summary: Hovered then disappeared behind a mountain then reapeered from behind mountain hovered again then dissapeered for good

content.detailedDescription:
Preparing milk for a child. 
saw a light
two moved brightly lights
what the fack
they are moving
i feel full of afraid
i loose him from my sight
content.summary: Two moved brightly lights

content.detailedDescription: Driving home, 8 at night. saw in the distance a group of lights in a triangle shap.. seemed odd.  continued driving, the lights got bigger, one of them was over the thruway and i drove under it.  the light was very large with diffused light and slighly metalic.  no definate outline.  lost sight when i went under a bridge.  still can't quite get my head around this.
content.summary: Driving home, saw objects, 3 lights in a triangle shape, did not move .Drove under one.Slightly metalic diffused light.  very large.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my deck, observing sattelites at @ 11:30 at night, looking towards the se. the view extends into the adirondack park wilderness area.

i noticed a triangle shaped lighted object in the distance at a few hundred feet above tree level.  it was making a dull roaring noise, which became loader as it approached. it sounded like a c-130 at take off, 

as it approached, it's shape reminded me of a concorde aircraft, and the noise was equally as deafening. the lighted silloute seemed similar also, i thought it was possibly a russian bomber being tested at fort drum, it was streamlined and pointy in appearence, and appeared to have landing lights on and navigation lights. 

however, it took forever for this thing to cover any distance, and i do not think it was travelling at more than 40 or 50 mph. 

as it passed over the cabin, the object was clearly a rectangular craft, shaped like a large shoebox, was not very far up, maybe 500 feet max, and appeared as if it was rigged with lighting to make it appear as if it were something other than a big balloon.  as it passed overhead, it appeared to have four each simulated engines, round in shape and lit orange to yellow, too simulate flaming jet engines, (two engines in close proximty on either side of the aircraft) and the lighted rear end of the box bled through partially to the bottom of the box shaped craft.  the noise, extremely loud, did not make any sense given the speed of the vehilcle and the look of the engines.  it appeared to be about 100 feet wide, and 400 feet long, with a width of 40 feet or so, the upper portion not being lit well.  

....The noise continued, seemed to indicate that it was not a hot air balloon enthuist's prank. it disappered out of view, heading through a very rural area to the direction of fort drum military base.  i would suggest google earth to look for odd aircraft hangers. 

my feeling upon initially seeing it approach was sheer terror, primarily because of the noise, but after observing the big beast, i felt as though it was a large heavy lift balloon machine with a psy-ops feature to distract an enemy.  oddly, i looked for windows, doors or protrusions and saw no sign of such.  how one would use such a balloon is a bit of a mystery. 

if the machine were used in combat, it would be easy pickings to shoot at!
content.summary: Headed towards my cabin, went over cabin, went out of view

content.detailedDescription: Driving home with a friend, i seen a row of lights, light up and then go out suddenly. very strange! i thought it was flares at first, but then they just went out, as if they had been turned of. it was off of hwy 41 south of appleton wi on 11/12/13.
content.summary: I seen yellow lights in a horizontal row light up and then go out.

content.detailedDescription: I have been visit two nights in a row by startlike lights that project a strobe that looks like a cross between a diamond and a stopsign. i can see it through my video camera with the zoom all the way on but this strobe cannot be seen with the naked eye. these start like lights do move but subtely and are mostly hovering. i marked them again things on the ground and this is how i know they are moving. also in my video there are clicking sounds that shoul;d not be there. another person has reported to me they are hearing high pitched soinds coming from the videos. it's very cold here now so it is not animal sounds. i will repoert more if the situation escalates. thank you.
content.summary: It looks like a star with white light points all the way around it. when i filmed it however it is projecting a diamond shaped light beam which made me originally think it was diamond shaped.

content.detailedDescription:
On monday, november 4th, 2013, an extremely clear night to see stars, i took my dog out around 9pm for a walk.  i was 30 ft. in front of my house when i heard a continuous grrrrrrrrr click grrrrrrrrrrr click hnnnnnnn(like the high compression whine when a helicopter lands).  it sounded as though the object was sitting out back. i moved 8-10ft closer to the east side of the house to see what it was but could not find any light.  i know there was an object there but i could not see it.  my yellow lab led me towards it with his nose straight in the air. instead of confronting the object behind my house i called the dog and went in and told my wife.  she was concerned because i was standing there ghost white. i explained that there is something in the backyard that sounds like a continuous grrrrrrrrr click grrrrrrrrrrr click hnnnnnnn(like the high compression whine when a helicopter lands) and maybe it was some kind of jet propulsion engine or electromagnetic object.  she asked if i wanted to go check it and i said, no.  it was not bothering me and i was not going to bother it. just as she began telling me i am crazy, she flicked the light on in the kitchen(the east side of the house) and we heard a dense clang sound like brass symbols crashing but without the reverberating gong. her eyes widened in disbelief and the light above her head on the ceiling surged power and emitted explosive light 2 feet in every direction nearly consuming the hair on her head. it seemed as though the object was on the southeast side of the house and it ejected or ascended as if it was spooked by the kitchen light coming on. i suspect we were being spied on or analyzed. we went to bed that night somewhat disturbed from the incident. the next morning i was up early to travel. it rained the next day or two and when i got back on thurs., november 7th i searched for any trace of an object. i found a span of burn marks spanning 8-10 feet wide. 
    in conclusion, i would like to make one other note. last year around this time (right before the snow came) i had an odd dream that there was an object above my house and something was scanning me. i awoke shaking, hyperventilating, and feeling as though something had been taken from me.
content.summary: Heard object behind house, found burn marks in grass,  power surge upon take off

content.detailedDescription: Heading west on 11b, i look to my right (south) and observered two orange lights hovering above the tree tops, in the area of power lines. the orange objects were visible for about 60 seconds then the orange object on the left disapeared, the object didnt move it's light got dimer untill it was gone, as i continued driving west the other objected was obstructed from my view by pine trees, upon coming to another clearing, the objects was gone. i turned around and went back to the area i first saw the light, but nothing was there..
content.summary: 2 large orange ball of light hovering over power lines

content.detailedDescription: Hi.I am a 22 years old boy from cluj-napoca city in romania.I am a hobby photographer and i like to take photos in nature.Near my house there is an ex parachute tower(now it is used to train dogs) and i made some photos of it because the light was great(it was sunset around 8 pm) but i discovered some flying things in the sky after i took the picture only,then i looked to the sky and was nothing there.The real thing is that on that day i made some photos of cluj napoca (because i live on a hill and from a point i can see the whole city) and i observe that beneath the other hill there are some flying darkish globe,circular things.I will send the pictures and i would really like some answers.I belive in extraterestrial life and i am fascinated about this subiect i watch documentaries about e.T life and ufo's.I would like to know if there are some ufo's in my pictures or there is something else.Thank you.(the pitures were taken his summer in july.I send the pictures to a lot of ppl but i didn't get any answer )
content.summary: I saw 2 types of objects but pure accidentally.I will describe more detailed.

content.detailedDescription:
We were woken up by what felt like an earthquake at 03:50 central time.

we ran outside and the air and ground was vibrating like standing next to a very loud speaker with a lot of bass.  a bit faster than a heart beat.

there was no sound.

the craft was moving about 20mph in a w to e direction ... a little ne... heading toward killen/fort hood, tx.

the craft was as big as my 5 acres.  there was no sound, no lights, the craft was illuminated by my street light.  it was a very dark grey and we could see features ... not very symmetrical in nature.  

the craft was disk shape with a center fuselage, split down the middle, with the fuselage in-between the two disks.  the fuselage was semi-square with rounded edges and corners. kind of like batman's batwing... kind of.

the disk was about 30 feet thick/tall. there was no bevel or curve to shape.  it was a big squarish disk split in half with a squarish fuselage.   

it took about 5 minutes before it disappeared into the darkness. it did not zip away.  there was swoosh just the steady deep earth shaking vibrations.  no damage to my home or trees or anything.  enough vibration to wake us up and to make us run outside.

shortly afterward (a minute or two), two apache helicopters followed after it, traveling about the same speed.
content.summary: 03:50 20mph central, tx

content.detailedDescription: These lights appear every night the do different things all the time the change shape they glow under my window i just know that these air crafts are so far advaned that we dont dont have any thing that would be able to protect if they where to attack us so i wish that some would take the time for five minutes to to look at them these photos i submit to you  aew taken feo a camera phone ,
content.shape: Circle,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Oval,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Round disk that chane shape

content.detailedDescription: I was making a delivery to the school kitchen.I look up at the sky often because i have seen so many,like over 15 in the past 20 yrs.Looked north from school parking lot and saw a very shiny object like the size of jupiter. was going very slow towards the west and ascending into a clear blue sky. saw it for about 10 minutes total.It went up pretty high so that it was just a tiny shiny dot in the sky,it never stopped while i was looking at it.I felt happy to have seen it and can not wait to see the next one.
content.summary: Very shiny object

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my house watching tv when i happened to glance out the window and saw two big bright orange balls of light in the sky. they never moved but then one ball faded into nothing and then the other. my mother was watching tv with me and a short while later said she said one ball in a different direction still not moving but then it split into three balls in a line and by the time i saw them they split into five in a line. then from right to left they each started to fade. about 10 to 15 minutes later we both saw two more orange balls a little ways away from the five in a line. they did the same thing. after each sighting i ran outside but heard and saw nothing. eventually they started appearing randomly farther and farther away to the south still. a few other people i know said they had seen the same thing on either the same night or the night before.
content.summary: Big bright orange balls of light that appeared, split, and then faded.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to work, north bound on hwy 41. first saw them as i came onto the highway from hwy 26 on the west side of 41.
i saw these lights before, and from the overpass they were very visible.
i thought it was the b-17 from the eaa grounds the first time i saw the lights. now i think they are flares, but acnnot explain why i could not hear the jets.
first i saw one single orange light, it faded out after about 2 seconds and a srting of 3 came on, followed by another string of 3, then they went out one at a time in reverse order as they came on. after stopping, i saw several more single and double lights over the lake butte des morts are and south or west of oshkosh. i stopped across the bridge at the 76 exit truck stop.
i had my hd camera but i could not get naything to show up despite how bright they were.
content.summary: Lights in the sky. one string of 6 that came on and went out in order. at least 10 individual lights too

content.detailedDescription: I am an avid believer in ufos and the ancient alien theory so i keep my eyes fixated on the sky daily. this day in particular, i was leaving my house on the way to school. i park my car facing west, so as soon as i got in it, i immediately noticed the object in the sky. i also saw four of what appeared to be military jets flying in its vicinity. the object was so far away i didn't even bother trying to take a picture as the focus on my phone wouldn't pick up an image, and i was in total shock and awe at the moment. the object was red at first, then the red light faded to reveal a white, cigar shaped craft, hovering in the sky. it was completely still. then it started to glow white, like an aura, then went back red, then white again. the next thing sealed the deal for me about it being an ufo. it emitted two huge balls of light from it's belly. not detached, but emitting them from the hull. they were extremely bright, like what you would expect from a space shuttle taking off, but completely white. then it started to turn in place, as if it was observing the planes flying around it. then it turned red and flew off in one direction and came back to approximately the same place. the only way i knew it flew away is the fact that it got smaller. i was trying to track it while i was driving and every time i saw it, it was in a different position in the sky, same altitude, just different place. i also noticed more planes in the sky while i was driving and counted 7 total. i eventually lost the craft because i had to travel in the opposite direction towards the school, but the planes and helicopters in the sky continued throughout the three and a half hours of school and on my way home. i kept the event to myself during class but i told my girlfriend as soon as i got home. in hind-sight, i wish i would've taken a picture. if anybody else saw the object and reported it to you guys, please e-mail me so i know i wasn't the only one to see it.
content.summary: I saw an unexplainable hovering cigar with 5-7 jets around it.

content.detailedDescription:
On saturday morning i was on my back deck after letting my dog out to relieve itself. the sun was out and at it the wind was breezy/gusty. i was having a smoke and looking at my next door neighbor's roof when my eye caught movement just to the left of where i was looking. i looked directly at the object and it was coming from the west towards the east between our houses and traveled at a slow walking speed. the height above ground was less than 30' and i was standing on my deck which is 3-4' above ground. the object traveled from west to east and then gently turned (about a 20' radius)north until i was no longer able to see it. it was simply too difficult to follow because it blended so well. during the time i observed this object, it made no sound and did not change elevation and its slow speed was constant. i had a perfect view of this thing for about 20 seconds under ideal viewing conditions.
 from the time i first noticed the object, i can only describe it as a perfectly round distortion, about 10-12" in diameter that was traveling very slowly. the tree branches and other items behind the object did not match up perfectly while looking through the object. i studied it intently trying to understand what exactly i was looking at. one of my first thoughts was "this thing doesn't want to be seen". it was very difficult to follow the object even while it was traveling at such a slow speed of probably about 4' per second. just after the object passed me, i noticed that the object then began to "flutter" faint white flashes inside the object that were retained inside the ball like object. the fluttering was not uniform as in the whole object did not pulse or glow. the fluttering looked like a large almost transparent butterfly with faint white wing edges that had too much material that flowed and was flapping very fast inside the ball. 
my background is in mechanical engineering and i have never seen anything that has perplexed or shook me more than seeing this object.
content.summary: Observed nearly clear orb fly approx. 20-30' in front of me at a very slow speed.

content.detailedDescription: Saw the lights late this time... 1st light disappeared in a second ..2nd light did the same 3 seconds later.  sky was clear.  there was no turn of a jet's landing lights as i have seen near o'hare  in st. charles.  i was thinking that jupiter was in the sky tonight, but it is in the west tonight.   it looked like there was a planet with another kicked in for flavor like saturn or mercury.  they just disappeared!!!     de ja vue?
content.summary: Saw the same thing 3-5 years ago at this location!

content.detailedDescription:
At around 5:20 this evening i was pulling into my drive way and noticed bright white light at about a 48 degree looking south east towards the blue mountains.  as i looked closer it appeared to be stationary and not a plane or helicopter.  i had a pair of binoculars in my car so i got the out and focused on the light.  through the binoculars it appeared to have s some what of a saucer shape, but was really hard to tell.  my wife and watched the light through the binocs as well as taking some photos with our phone camera.  after about 20 minutes i noticed that there were like little satellites (about 9 to 11) that were in various places around the mother light.  the little lights were much more colored having a green, white and blue swirling effect.  they appeared to be stationary around the mother light.  after about 25 minutes of watching the mother light and the little lights one of the little ones started traversing the sky from an east to s. west trajectory.  it was very colorful in that the 3 colors mentioned above were readily apparent.  i watched the little light until it disappeared into the southern sky.  at about 6:20 the main light started to dim and was progressively getting dimmer.  at about 6:25 i heard a jet go overhead and was headed in a southerly direction, but not directly headed to the main light.  i watched the jet until it went out of  view.  i definitely heard the jet engines and i thought it was probably military as the direction was not in one of the major commercial routes.  i came into the house as my hands were freezing and the light was about gone.  from time that i first observed the light until i went inside was about 45 minutes.  this is the second time that we have observed the light (two weeks ago was the first time on a sunday at about 5:38 in the afternoon) but it was the first time that we observed the satellites' that were surrounding the main mother light.  i also put a very powerful hand held laser on the mother light and smaller lights with no impact.  


the main light did appear to be somewhat on the reddish hue on the bottom of the light.

my feelings watching this was one of wonder and awe to be able to see something that i have read about, but now was actually seeing this for myself.
content.summary: A bright star  like white light appeared at about 5:20 pm around it 9 t0 11 pulsating flashing objects.

content.detailedDescription: Husband took dog out and noticed bright object in sw sky @ 6:33pm (brighter than any star) identical to one he observed the night before, only last night it was in a ne position.  it was a clear night and the temp was in the 20's.  he called me to see it.  object hovered pretty steady for 20+ minutes as we took video of it.  it had a pulsating effect. at times you could see different colors.  we didn't hear any noise from it.  it slowly went below the treeline and we lost sight from our yard.  we were going to the store anyway, so we hopped in the car to see if we could still see it beyond the treeline.  sure enough we did.  it seemed to be moving se and then sw.  at one point it looked more like a rectangle of light in the sky vs. star shaped.  we watched as it seemed to get smaller and smaller, seemed to be moving further away from us in sw direction.  i will attach the 2 videos i took. i was glad to get these videos as my video camera was ready to die, so they are pretty brief.  they are date and time stamped, however, we just turned the clocks back an hour a week or so ago and i did not adjust the time on my video camera so please note that the actual time is one hour earlier. if you can, watch the video frame by frame, very interesting colors and what looks like a saucer at a few points.  also, please note that i am holding the video camera so it looks jumpy (it was cold out and i was shivering).
content.summary: Brilliant light in sky
